Module SoftEng_2024
Package SoftEng_2024.View

Class GUIMain

java.lang.Object
javafx.application.Application
SoftEng_2024.View.GUIMain
All Implemented Interfaces:
View
public class GUIMain extends javafx.application.Application implements View
This class represents the main application for the GUI. It implements the Application interface and serves as the entry point for launching the GUI.
